channel.title: Silicon Valley's Safe Space
channel.description:
Silicon Valley’s Safe Space: this article from yesterday's NYTimes seems related to several OGM threads (themes? conversations? ...) on how to have conversations about topics that raise temperatures. It also is my first intro to "the Rationalists" (although I met some "Objectivists" in a NYC software scene 20 years ago):
https://www.nytimes.com/2021/02/13/technology/slate-star-codex-rationalists.html
This seems related to "Two Perspectives on Dialog" from @scottmoehring and "Facing the age of chaos" from @kenhomer.
(And once I figure out how to link to the actual topics, I will update this.)
